scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx swc --config-file .swcrc.build src -s -d dist
scripts.dev: rm -rf out && npx swc --config-file .swcrc.dev src -s -d out && node -r source-map-support/register -r reflect-metadata out/main.js
scripts.test: rm -rf out && npx swc --config-file .swcrc.dev src -s -d out && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=silent node -r source-map-support/register -r reflect-metadata --experimental-vm-modules ./node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest.config.cjs
scripts.test:e2e: rm -rf out && npx swc --config-file .swcrc.dev src -s -d out && NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=silent node -r source-map-support/register -r reflect-metadata --experimental-vm-modules ./node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config jest-e2e.config.cjs
